Contact the City Council
========================





Let the Mayor and City Council know how they are doing in your neighborhood. Whether you have a compliment, complaint, suggestion or question, the City Council is committed to listening to what you have to say. Contact Council members directly through the form below.

To report issues within the City of Tyler, please follow the below links before contacting the City Council.



Solicitations for products or services will not receive a response. For information on becoming a City of Tyler vendor, please visit our
Purchasing Department webpage.



Address


City





The Address field is a required field and cannot be left blank.

Phone Number


Phone

Email


The Email field is a required field and cannot be left blank.

Mayor Don Warren

Stuart Hene, District 1

Petra Hawkins, District 2

Shonda Marsh, District 3

James Wynne, District 4

Lloyd Nichols, District 5

Brad Curtis, District 6

Entire City Council




Have you previously contacted a City Department about the matter?


The Have you previously contacted a City Department about the matter? field is a required field and cannot be left blank.



Would you like us to contact you regarding this matter?


The Would you like us to contact you regarding this matter? field is a required field and cannot be left blank.
